This is an incremental solution of the first 70 frames of the Bundle Adjustment (BA)
dataset New College.

This shows an evolution of the solution over time. To reset to the start, press "J".
If you need other controls such as e.g. pause, you need to implement them yourself.

The original data can be obtained freely (upon request) at http://www.robots.ox.ac.uk/NewCollegeData/

This expects to be unpacked to a folder, so that the graphviewer binary is one level up.
